long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Setting up your OTPs has never been easier!

Features:

➤ Add Secrets Easily: Quickly add secrets via image URL, image file, or scan QR codes through the webcam with the Advanced Add Button.

➤ Autofill: Automatically fill in OTPs on selected websites for a seamless login experience. When enabled, this feature updates the OTP field every 30 seconds, ensuring the most current OTP is available.

➤ Chrome Sync: Access your OTPs on any Chrome device logged into the same account, ensuring continuity across devices.

➤ Clipboard Copying: Copy OTPs to the clipboard by clicking the corresponding token box, making it easy to paste where needed.

➤ Extensive Language Support: Available in over 45 languages, making Authenticator Pro accessible worldwide.

➤ Online Time Sync: Syncs the 30-second OTP timer with the internet for better accuracy.

➤ Password Protection: Secure your OTPs and secrets with encrypted password protection, ensuring they are only accessible to you.

➤ Popup Mode: Open Authenticator Pro in a separate popup window, providing quick and convenient access to OTPs.

➤ QR Code Retrieval: Retrieve your stored secrets via QR code or text string for easy reference.

➤ Themes: Choose between Light and Dark Themes to match your browser's aesthetic (more themes coming soon).

➤ Token Management: View, edit, and delete active OTP tokens directly within the extension.

Authenticator Pro offers a user-friendly interface with powerful customization options, making it the ideal tool for managing OTPs and securing account access.

This is open source software, and you can contribute or review the source code on GitHub.
